# image()

**Instance Method**

Returns the current contents of the image accumulator.

## Declaration

```swift
func image() -> CIImage
```

## Return Value

The  image object that represents the current contents of the image accumulator.

## Obtaining Data From an Image Accumulator

- **extent**: The extent of the image associated with the image accumulator.
- **format**: The pixel format of the image accumulator.
